item.title: 卡地纳健康称将不再与 UnitedHealth 的 OptumRx 续约
item.description: 卡地纳健康公司周一表示，其与联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group Inc）旗下 OptumRx 公司的医药分销合同将在 6 月底到期后不再续签。【原文：Cardinal Health said on Monday its pharma distribution contracts with UnitedHealth Group Inc's OptumRx unit will not be renewed after they expire at the end of June.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝与 Cellares 达成 3.8 亿美元 CAR-T 疗法供应协议
item.description: 布里斯托尔-迈尔斯-施贵宝公司（Bristol Myers Squibb）和 Cellares 公司周一表示，双方已达成一项价值 3.8 亿美元的协议，为更多患者提供 CAR-T 细胞疗法。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb and Cellares said on Monday they have reached a $380 million deal to supply CAR-T cell therapies to more patients.】

item.title: Trafigura 称，新技术推动电力消费，铜需求将激增
item.description: 大宗商品交易商 Trafigura 告诉路透社，电动汽车、电力基础设施、人工智能和自动化领域的蓬勃发展将在未来十年内带来至少 1000 万吨的额外铜消费量。【原文：Flourishing activity in the electric vehicle, power infrastructure, AI and automation sectors will lead to at least 10 million metric tons of additional copper consumption over the next decade, commodity trader Trafigura told Reuters.】

item.title: 由于灵活计划的需求，Verizon 第一季度用户损失减少
item.description: Verizon 通信公司周一表示，由于其灵活的计划以及为 Netflix 和华纳兄弟 Discovery's Max 等服务提供折扣价的流媒体捆绑服务，该公司第一季度的无线用户流失量低于预期。【原文：Verizon Communications said on Monday it lost fewer-than-expected wireless subscribers in the first quarter thanks to its flexible plans and streaming bundles offering discounted pricing for services such as Netflix and Warner Bros Discovery's Max.】

item.title: 旅游公司维京控股（Viking Holdings）在美国首次公开募股中的目标估值高达 108 亿美元
item.description: 旅游公司维京控股（Viking Holdings）周一表示，该公司将在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高达 108 亿美元的估值，它将加入众多希望利用资本市场反弹机会的公司行列。【原文：Travel firm Viking Holdings said on Monday it is seeking a valuation of up to $10.8 billion in its initial public offering in the United States, as it joins a slew of companies looking to take advantage of a rebound in the capital market.】

item.title: 美国低收入消费者面临贷款压力，而银行却撤资了
item.description: 根据最近的数据和银行高管的说法，美国低收入借款人在偿还贷款方面越来越吃力，这促使银行在发放信用卡和汽车贷款时变得更加谨慎。【原文：U.S. borrowers on lower incomes are increasingly struggling to keep up with their loan payments, according to recent data and bank executives, prompting banks to become more cautious about dishing out credit cards and car loans.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势缓解，期货在周五抛售后回升
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势缓和提振了风险情绪，美国股指期货在前一交易日下跌后于周一上涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained on Monday after slumping in the previous session as easing Middle East tensions buoyed risk sentiment, while investors looked ahead for an action-packed week with major tech earnings and a key inflation print.】

item.title: 早间竞价：大型科技公司第一季度业绩下滑，英伟达遭重创
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：页岩油收益放缓，深水港争夺客户
item.description: 随着上个十年美国页岩油的蓬勃发展，一家石油管道公司雄心勃勃地提出在得克萨斯州海岸建造一个耗资数十亿美元的出口港，将国内原油运往欧洲和亚洲的买家。【原文：As U.S. shale oil boomed last decade, an oil pipeline company pitched an ambitious multi-billion-dollar export port off the Texas coast to ship domestic crude to buyers in Europe and Asia.】

item.title: 尽管有通胀恐慌，美债多头仍看好最新一轮抛售
item.description: 4 月份迄今为止美国债券的大幅下挫正促使一些投资者考虑在美联储降息之前将更多资金分配到该资产类别，以锁定更高的收益率。【原文：A sharp selloff in U.S. bonds so far in April is prompting some investors to consider allocating more funds to the asset class to lock in higher yields ahead of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, a prospect that remains investors’ base case despite U.S. economic resilience.】

item.title: 减税政策拖累中国一季度财政收入下降
item.description: 中国财政部周一表示，由于此前的减税政策等一些特殊因素的影响，中国第一季度财政收入同比下降 2.3%。【原文：China's fiscal revenue in the first quarter fell 2.3% from a year earlier, as some special factors including previous tax cut policies weighed, the finance ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国梦变质迫使西方金融企业削减成本
item.description: 就在几年前，随着中国经济的蓬勃发展，利润丰厚的商业前景促使从投资银行到资产管理的西方金融公司争相扩大业务范围，并从世界各地招募人才。【原文：Just a few years ago, lucrative business prospects in China on the back of a booming economy led to a scramble among Western financial firms, from investment banking to asset management, to expand their footprints and source talent from across the world.】

item.title: 小米首席执行官称将在车展上介绍 SU7 的产能和交付计划
item.description: 小米公司首席执行官周一发布微博称，该公司将在北京车展上提供有关 SU7 汽车产能和交付计划的更多细节。【原文：Xiaomi's CEO said the company will offer more details about its production capacity and delivery plan for the SU7 vehicle at the Beijing Auto Show, according to a Weibo post on Monday.】

item.title: 国家规划师称中国深圳市电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车价格下降
item.description: 中国国家规划师周一表示，作为电动汽车普及率较高的大都市，中国南方深圳市今年的电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车价格下降了5%至10%。【原文：Prices of electric cars and plug-in hybrids in China's Southern Shenzhen city, a metropolis with high EV adoption, have fallen 5% to 10% this year, the country's state planner said on Monday.】

item.title: 服装零售商 Express 申请美国破产保护，将关闭 100 多家门店
item.description: 时装零售商 Express Inc 周一表示，已在美国申请破产保护，并打算关闭 100 多家门店。【原文：Fashion retailer Express Inc has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the United States and intends to close more than 100 stores, it said on Monday.】

item.title: CVC 在阿姆斯特丹首次公开募股中的目标估值高达 160 亿美元
item.description: 私募股权投资集团 CVC Capital Partners 周一表示，其首次公开募股（IPO）的目标市值将高达 150 亿欧元（160 亿美元）。【原文：CVC Capital Partners is targeting a market capitalisation as high as 15 billion euros ($16 billion) in its initial public offering (IPO), the private equity group said on Monday.】

item.title: Blackstone 为收购夏奇拉音乐所有者 Hipgnosis 的提议增添甜头
item.description: Hipgnosis Songs Fund 周一表示，如果私募股权投资巨头提出正式要约收购这家音乐版权投资公司，Blackstone 将 "考虑 "向股东推荐该改进方案。【原文：Hipgnosis Songs Fund said on Monday Blackstone has made an improved proposal that it would be "minded" to recommend to shareholders if the private equity giant were to table a formal offer to buy the music rights investment firm.】

item.title: 聚焦：双向电动汽车充电成为现实，汽车制造商希望从中分一杯羹
item.description: 从通用汽车公司到沃尔沃汽车公司的汽车制造商，以及公用事业公司和充电应用运营商都在计算自己的经济收益，因为电动汽车可以让车主将电能卖回电网，这已成为一个更加现实的前景。【原文：Automakers from General Motors to Volvo Cars , alongside utilities and charging app operators are calculating their financial cut as EVs that allow their owners to sell power back to grids become a more realistic prospect.】

item.title: 美股 "早该 "回落，考验逢低买入者的决心
item.description: 美国股市半年来首次大幅回落，让投资者不知道是该买入还是等待更多下跌。【原文：The first sharp pullback for U.S. stocks in half a year is leaving investors wondering whether to buy the dip or hold out for more declines.】

item.title: 早间竞标令人难忘的一周之后的纾缓反弹
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 马来西亚将提供激励措施吸引全球科技公司
item.description: 马来西亚经济部长周一表示，马来西亚将提供包括租金和就业通行证减免和补贴以及企业利润优惠税率在内的激励措施，以吸引全球科技公司。【原文：Malaysia will offer incentives including exemptions and subsidies on rents and employment passes as well as concessionary tax rates on corporate profits to attract global tech companies, its economy minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 中东担忧缓解，亚洲股市上扬，石油和黄金回落
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市收复部分失地，债券收益率上升，原因是对中东冲突扩大的担忧减弱，投资者重新转向风险较高的资产。【原文：Asian stocks recovered some losses on Monday and bond yields rose as fears of a wider Middle East conflict ebbed, with investors gravitating back towards riskier assets.】

item.title: 腾讯时隔七年将于五月发布《地下城与勇士》手机游戏
item.description: 中国科技巨头腾讯控股周一表示，经过七年的开发，它将于 5 月 21 日发布备受期待的《地下城与勇士》手机游戏。【原文：Chinese tech giant Tencent Holdings said on Monday that it will release its much-anticipated "Dungeon and Fighter" mobile game on May 21 after seven years of development.】

item.title: 麦格理银行部门停止新增汽车贷款，专注于房贷增长
item.description: 澳大利亚金融企业集团麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）周一表示，其银行和金融服务部门将停止通过直接、中介和委托租赁渠道发放新的汽车贷款，以优先发展住房贷款和存款业务。【原文：Australian financial conglomerate Macquarie Group said on Monday its banking and financial services unit will stop new car loans through direct, broker and novated lease channels in a bid to prioritise growth of home loan and deposit offerings.】

item.title: 激烈竞争导致盈利前景下调，新西兰航空股价下跌
item.description: 新西兰航空公司周一下调了年度盈利预期，理由是经济逆风和生活成本危机导致国内和北美市场的收入疲软，从而使该航空公司的股价跌至近两年的低点。【原文：Air New Zealand trimmed its annual earnings estimates on Monday, citing economic headwinds and a cost-of-living crisis leading to softer revenue in domestic and North American markets, sending the carrier's shares to a near two-year low.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪将电动皮卡命名为 "比亚迪鲨鱼
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周一表示，其电动皮卡将被命名为 "比亚迪鲨鱼"，并将配备一套名为 "双模式越野"（DMO）的插电式混合动力系统。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD said on Monday its electric pickup truck will be called BYD Shark and will feature a plug-in hybrid system called Dual Mode Off-Road (DMO), which it developed for improving off-road driving experiences.】

item.title: 疲惫的一周过后，货币平静而谨慎
item.description: 欧元和日元在周一的亚洲早盘交易中相对稳定，美元在上周紧张的政策和地缘政治发展之后维持在高位附近。【原文：The euro and yen were relatively steady in early Asian trading on Monday and the U.S. dollar stayed near its highs after last week's hectic policy and geopolitical developments.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加，降息担忧凸显，油价回落
item.description: 周一亚洲开盘时，油价下跌，受市场重新关注基本面的拖累，以色列和伊朗在以色列对伊朗发动明显的小规模打击后，淡化了中东敌对行动升级的风险。【原文：Oil prices fell at Asia's open on Monday, dragged down by a renewed focus on market fundamentals, as Israel and Iran played down the risks of an escalation of hostilities in the Middle East after Israel's apparently small strike on Iran.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：Salesforce 收购 Informatica 的谈判告吹
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，客户关系软件制造商 Salesforce 与数据管理软件公司 Informatica 之间的谈判因双方无法就条款达成一致而失败。【原文：Talks between customer relations software maker Salesforce and data-management software firm Informatica have failed after the companies could not agree on terms, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财政部长称中东紧张局势加剧全球经济担忧
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长周一警告说，中东事件加剧了人们对全球经济的担忧，并将影响政府五月份的预算，其主要贸易伙伴的近期展望也将下调。【原文：Australia's treasurer warned on Monday that events in the Middle East are fueling concerns for the global economy and will shape the government's budget in May, with near-term outlook downgrades for its major trading partners.】
